\w Wherefore|strong="H3606"\w* \w at|strong="H6903"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w* \w came|strong="H7127"\w* \w near|strong="H7127"\w*, \w and|strong="H2166"\w* brought accusation \w against|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*.

They \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w forever|strong="H5957"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w in|strong="H5020"\w* \add his\add* \w rage|strong="H7266"\w* \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w fury|strong="H2528"\w* commanded \w to|strong="H6925"\w* bring \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4430"\w* they brought these \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5020"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w need|strong="H2818"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w answer|strong="H6600"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H6600"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* be \add so\add*, \w our|strong="H4481"\w* God \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H3202"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* \w us|strong="H7804"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* \w us|strong="H7804"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w thy|strong="H6399"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*, \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w thy|strong="H6399"\w* gods, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w image|strong="H6755"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H2006"\w* hast \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4336"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* commanded \w certain|strong="H1400"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1401"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w army|strong="H2429"\w* \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w bind|strong="H3729"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w Abed-nego|strong="H5665"\w*, \add and\add* \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* them \w into|strong="H7412"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.

Then these \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w bound|strong="H3729"\w* in their \w hosen|strong="H6361"\w*, their tunics, and their mantles, and their \add other\add* \w garments|strong="H3831"\w*, and \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w cast|strong="H7412"\w* \w into|strong="H1459"\w* the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* \w of|strong="H1459"\w* the \w burning|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.
